#labels Phase-Deploy
How to move a database from one server to another using a backup

  # Stop tomcat
  # Clean out exist database by deleting current files
  # Restart tomcat
  # Restore
  # Log in with admin client and reindex all collections
  # (Change admin password to match tomcat and restart)
  # Visit the page repository/service/admin/changehost.xql - you should not need to change the values in the input boxes
